releaseNotes:
Noty v1.5 - Refinement & Polish

• Enhanced Arabic Support: Further improvements to Egyptian Arabic recognition
• Faster AI Processing: Reduced waiting time for AI operations
• Better Context Understanding: More accurate extraction of details
• UI Polish: Smoother animations and better visual feedback
• Widget Synchronization: Improved real-time updates
• Memory Optimization: Reduced memory usage during recording
• Bug Fixes: Resolved several issues reported by users
